tooltip.verdant_arcanum.grove_soil: Rich soil infused with arcane energy
tooltip.verdant_arcanum.grove_soil.detai: Required for growing special magical plants
Supports faster growth for most arcane plants
tooltip.verdant_arcanum.flame_flower_see: Mystical seeds that grow into fire-resistant plants
Must be planted on Grove Soil to grow
Goes through 3 growth stages: Seed → Bud → Bloom
Grows faster when exposed to higher temperatures
tooltip.verdant_arcanum.flame_flower_blo: A vibrant flower with ember-like petals
Can be brewed into potions of Fire Resistance
Emits a faint warmth when held
tooltip.verdant_arcanum.spell_essence: Pure magical essence extracted from a magical plant
tooltip.verdant_arcanum.spell_essence.ro: Contains the essence of earth binding
tooltip.verdant_arcanum.spell_essence.ti: Contains the essence of time manipulation
tooltip.verdant_arcanum.spell_essence.de: Can be used to graft magical properties into a Living Staff
Required for advanced magical crafting recipes
tooltip.verdant_arcanum.spell_essence.fl: Casts a small fireball when used
tooltip.verdant_arcanum.spell_essence.bl: Teleports you in the direction you're looking
tooltip.verdant_arcanum.spell_essence.ro: Slows down nearby entities with magical vines
tooltip.verdant_arcanum.spell_essence.gu: Pushes entities away with a gust of wind
tooltip.verdant_arcanum.spell_essence.ti: Freezes entities in time around the caster
tooltip.verdant_arcanum.living_staff: A staff that bonds with magical essences
tooltip.verdant_arcanum.living_staff.det: Right-click with spell essence in hand to graft it to the staff
Right-click to cast the active spell
tooltip.verdant_arcanum.living_staff.scr: Sneak + Scroll to switch between grafted spells
tooltip.verdant_arcanum.blink_flower_see: Mystical seeds that grow into teleportation plants
Must be planted on Grove Soil to grow
Goes through 3 growth stages: Seed → Bud → Bloom
tooltip.verdant_arcanum.rootgrasp_flower: Mystical seeds that grow into binding plants
Must be planted on Grove Soil to grow
Goes through 3 growth stages: Seed → Bud → Bloom
Grows faster when near other plants
tooltip.verdant_arcanum.gust_flower_seed: Mystical seeds that grow into wind-related plants
Must be planted on Grove Soil to grow
Goes through 3 growth stages: Seed → Bud → Bloom
tooltip.verdant_arcanum.timestop_flower_: Mystical seeds that grow into time-related plants
Must be planted on Grove Soil to grow
Goes through 3 growth stages: Seed → Bud → Bloom
Grows at unpredictable rates due to time fluctuations
tooltip.verdant_arcanum.blink_flower_blo: A shimmering flower with ethereal petals
Can be brewed into potions of Swift Movement
Occasionally shifts between dimensions when observed
tooltip.verdant_arcanum.rootgrasp_flower: A sturdy flower with vine-like petals
Can be brewed into potions of Stability
Sometimes takes root in your inventory
tooltip.verdant_arcanum.gust_flower_bloo: A light, airy flower with feather-like petals
Can be brewed into potions of Feather Falling
tooltip.verdant_arcanum.timestop_flower_: A crystalline flower with clock-like patterns
Can be brewed into potions of Haste
Seems to exist between moments of time
